product_name: Kuhl The Law Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The Law pants from Kuhl don't mess around when it comes to comfort and durability. Constructed using heavy-duty yet soft cotton, these pants will give you years of dependable wear. Deluxe heavy-duty canvas is cut from high-quality cotton for soft hand that is oh-so comfortable. Pants feature Kuhl Rhino Technology, which places rugged exterior fabrics on top of soft, stretchy fabric for excellent durability and freedom of movement. Rhino Technology is used in high-mobility areas, such as the back waistband and the knees. 2 hand pockets, 2 rear pockets and 2 side pockets (1 zippered) offer up plenty of space for your essentials. Kuhl The Law pants have articulated knees and a gusseted crotch to facilitate freedom of movement for increased comfort.
short_description: The Law pants from Kuhl don't mess around when it comes to comfort and durability. Constructed using heavy-duty yet soft cotton, these pants will give you years of dependable wear.
